statement.p: Vasya's initial salary is 52500. If she receives a raise of 2500 each year, what is the first year her salary is greater (or equal to) 100,000?

solution.p: Her salary must increase more than 100,000-52500 = 47500. This will take \displaystyle\frac{{47500}}{{2500}}={19} years. Because she won't be more than 100,000 until the final, full year that is 19 years.
